title: security strategy
extract: A security strategy is thus an important document which details out series of steps necessary for an organization to identify, remediate and manage risks while staying complaint. An effective security strategy is comprehensive and dynamic, with the elasticity to respond to any type of security threat.

An effective security strategy is comprehensive and dynamic, with the elasticity to respond to any type of security threat.
